6087
6089 App(std::string app_description, std::string app_name, App *parent);
6090
6091public:
6094
6096 explicit App(std::string app_description = "", std::string app_name = "")
6097 : App(app_description, app_name, nullptr) {
6098 set_help_flag("-h,--help", "Print this help message and exit");
6099 }
6100
6101 App(const App &) = delete;
6102 App &operator=(const App &) = delete;
6103
6105 virtual ~App() = default;
6106
6113 App *callback(std::function<void()> app_callback) {
6114 if (immediate_callback_) {
6115 parse_complete_callback_ = std::move(app_callback);
6116 } else {
6117 final_callback_ = std::move(app_callback);
6118 }
6119 return this;
6120 }
6121
6124 App *final_callback(std::function<void()> app_callback) {
6125 final_callback_ = std::move(app_callback);
6126 return this;
6127 }
6128
6131 App *parse_complete_callback(std::function<void()> pc_callback) {
6132 parse_complete_callback_ = std::move(pc_callback);
6133 return this;
6134 }
6135
6138 App *preparse_callback(std::function<void(std::size_t)> pp_callback) {
6139 pre_parse_callback_ = std::move(pp_callback);
6140 return this;
6141 }
6142
6144 App *name(std::string app_name = "");
6145
6147 App *alias(std::string app_name);
6148
6150 App *allow_extras(bool allow = true) {
6151 allow_extras_ = allow;
6152 return this;
6153 }
6154
6156 App *required(bool require = true) {
6157 required_ = require;
6158 return this;
6159 }
6160
6162 App *disabled(bool disable = true) {
6163 disabled_ = disable;
6164 return this;
6165 }
6166
6168 App *silent(bool silence = true) {
6169 silent_ = silence;
6170 return this;
6171 }
6172
6175 App *disabled_by_default(bool disable = true) {
6176 if (disable) {
6177 default_startup = startup_mode::disabled;
6178 } else {
6179 default_startup = (default_startup == startup_mode::enabled) ? startup_mode::enabled
6180 : startup_mode::stable;
6181 }
6182 return this;
6183 }
6184
6187 App *enabled_by_default(bool enable = true) {
6188 if (enable) {
6189 default_startup = startup_mode::enabled;
6190 } else {
6191 default_startup = (default_startup == startup_mode::disabled) ? startup_mode::disabled
6192 : startup_mode::stable;
6193 }
6194 return this;
6195 }
6196
6198 App *immediate_callback(bool immediate = true);
6199
6201 App *validate_positionals(bool validate = true) {
6202 validate_positionals_ = validate;
6203 return this;
6204 }
6205
6207 App *validate_optional_arguments(bool validate = true) {
6208 validate_optional_arguments_ = validate;
6209 return this;
6210 }
6211
6213 App *allow_config_extras(bool allow = true) {
6214 if (allow) {
6215 allow_config_extras_ = config_extras_mode::capture;
6216 allow_extras_ = true;
6217 } else {
6218 allow_config_extras_ = config_extras_mode::error;
6219 }
6220 return this;
6221 }
6222
6224 App *allow_config_extras(config_extras_mode mode) {
6225 allow_config_extras_ = mode;
6226 return this;
6227 }
6228
6230 App *prefix_command(bool allow = true) {
6231 prefix_command_ = allow;
6232 return this;
6233 }
6234
6236 App *ignore_case(bool value = true);
6237
6240 App *allow_windows_style_options(bool value = true) {
6241 allow_windows_style_options_ = value;
6242 return this;
6243 }
6244
6246 App *positionals_at_end(bool value = true) {
6247 positionals_at_end_ = value;
6248 return this;
6249 }
6250
6252 App *configurable(bool value = true) {
6253 configurable_ = value;
6254 return this;
6255 }
6256
6258 App *ignore_underscore(bool value = true);

6261 App *formatter(std::shared_ptr<FormatterBase> fmt) {
6262 formatter_ = fmt;
6263 return this;
6264 }
6265
6267 App *formatter_fn(std::function<std::string(const App *, std::string, AppFormatMode)> fmt) {
6268 formatter_ = std::make_shared<FormatterLambda>(fmt);
6269 return this;
6270 }
6271
6273 App *config_formatter(std::shared_ptr<Config> fmt) {
6274 config_formatter_ = fmt;
6275 return this;
6276 }
6277
6279 CLI11_NODISCARD bool parsed() const { return parsed_ > 0; }
6280
6282 OptionDefaults *option_defaults() { return &option_defaults_; }
6283
6287
6302 Option *add_option(std::string option_name,
6303 callback_t option_callback,
6304 std::string option_description = "",
6305 bool defaulted = false,
6306 std::function<std::string()> func = {});
6307
6309 template <typename AssignTo,
6310 typename ConvertTo = AssignTo,
6311 enable_if_t<!std::is_const<ConvertTo>::value, detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6312 Option *add_option(std::string option_name,
6313 AssignTo &variable,
6314 std::string option_description = "") {
6315 auto fun = [&variable](const CLI::results_t &res) { // comment for spacing
6316 return detail::lexical_conversion<AssignTo, ConvertTo>(res, variable);
6317 };
6318
6319 Option *opt = add_option(option_name, fun, option_description, false, [&variable]() {
6320 return CLI::detail::checked_to_string<AssignTo, ConvertTo>(variable);
6321 });
6322 opt->type_name(detail::type_name<ConvertTo>());
6323 // these must be actual lvalues since (std::max) sometimes is defined in terms of references
6324 // and references to structs used in the evaluation can be temporary so that would cause
6325 // issues.
6326 auto Tcount = detail::type_count<AssignTo>::value;
6327 auto XCcount = detail::type_count<ConvertTo>::value;
6328 opt->type_size(detail::type_count_min<ConvertTo>::value, (std::max)(Tcount, XCcount));
6329 opt->expected(detail::expected_count<ConvertTo>::value);
6330 opt->run_callback_for_default();
6331 return opt;
6332 }
6333
6335 template <typename AssignTo,
6336 enable_if_t<!std::is_const<AssignTo>::value, detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6337 Option *add_option_no_stream(std::string option_name,
6338 AssignTo &variable,
6339 std::string option_description = "") {
6340 auto fun = [&variable](const CLI::results_t &res) { // comment for spacing
6341 return detail::lexical_conversion<AssignTo, AssignTo>(res, variable);
6342 };
6343
6344 Option *opt =
6345 add_option(option_name, fun, option_description, false, []() { return std::string{}; });
6346 opt->type_name(detail::type_name<AssignTo>());
6347 opt->type_size(detail::type_count_min<AssignTo>::value,
6348 detail::type_count<AssignTo>::value);
6349 opt->expected(detail::expected_count<AssignTo>::value);
6350 opt->run_callback_for_default();
6351 return opt;
6352 }
6353
6355 template <typename ArgType>
6356 Option *add_option_function(
6357 std::string option_name,
6358 const std::function<void(const ArgType &)> &func,
6359 std::string option_description = "") {
6360 auto fun = [func](const CLI::results_t &res) {
6361 ArgType variable;
6362 bool result = detail::lexical_conversion<ArgType, ArgType>(res, variable);
6363 if (result) {
6364 func(variable);
6365 }
6366 return result;
6367 };
6368
6369 Option *opt = add_option(option_name, std::move(fun), option_description, false);
6370 opt->type_name(detail::type_name<ArgType>());
6371 opt->type_size(detail::type_count_min<ArgType>::value, detail::type_count<ArgType>::value);
6372 opt->expected(detail::expected_count<ArgType>::value);
6373 return opt;
6374 }
6375
6377 Option *add_option(std::string option_name) {
6378 return add_option(option_name, CLI::callback_t{}, std::string{}, false);
6379 }
6380
6382 template <typename T,
6383 enable_if_t<std::is_const<T>::value && std::is_constructible<std::string, T>::value,
6384 detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6385 Option *add_option(std::string option_name, T &option_description) {
6386 return add_option(option_name, CLI::callback_t(), option_description, false);
6387 }
6388
6390 Option *set_help_flag(std::string flag_name = "", const std::string &help_description = "");
6391
6393 Option *set_help_all_flag(std::string help_name = "", const std::string &help_description = "");
6394
6396 Option *set_version_flag(
6397 std::string flag_name = "",
6398 const std::string &versionString = "",
6399 const std::string &version_help = "Display program version information and exit");
6400
6402 Option *set_version_flag(
6403 std::string flag_name,
6404 std::function<std::string()> vfunc,
6405 const std::string &version_help = "Display program version information and exit");
6406
6407private:
6409 Option *_add_flag_internal(std::string flag_name,
6410 CLI::callback_t fun,
6411 std::string flag_description);
6412
6413public:
6415 Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name) {
6416 return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, CLI::callback_t(), std::string{});
6417 }
6418
6422 template <typename T,
6423 enable_if_t<std::is_const<T>::value && std::is_constructible<std::string, T>::value,
6424 detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6425 Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name, T &flag_description) {
6426 return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, CLI::callback_t(), flag_description);
6427 }
6428
6431 template <typename T,
6432 enable_if_t<!detail::is_mutable_container<T>::value && !std::is_const<T>::value &&
6433 !std::is_constructible<std::function<void(int)>, T>::value,
6434 detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6435 Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name,
6436 T &flag_result,
6437 std::string flag_description = "") {
6438 CLI::callback_t fun = [&flag_result](const CLI::results_t &res) {
6439 return CLI::detail::lexical_cast(res[0], flag_result);
6440 };
6441 auto *opt = _add_flag_internal(flag_name, std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description));
6442 return detail::default_flag_modifiers<T>(opt);
6443 }
6444
6446 template <typename T,
6447 enable_if_t<!std::is_assignable<std::function<void(std::int64_t)> &, T>::value,
6448 detail::enabler> = detail::dummy>
6449 Option *add_flag(std::string flag_name,
6450 std::vector<T> &flag_results,
6451 std::string flag_description = "") {
6452 CLI::callback_t fun = [&flag_results](const CLI::results_t &res) {
6453 bool retval = true;
6454 for (const auto &elem : res) {
6455 flag_results.emplace_back();
6456 retval &= detail::lexical_cast(elem, flag_results.back());
6457 }
6458 return retval;
6459 };
6460 return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description))
6461 ->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::TakeAll)
6462 ->run_callback_for_default();
6463 }
6464
6466 Option *add_flag_callback(
6467 std::string flag_name,
6468 std::function<void(void)> function,
6469 std::string flag_description = "");
6470
6472 Option *add_flag_function(
6473 std::string flag_name,
6474 std::function<void(std::int64_t)> function,
6475 std::string flag_description = "");
6476
6477#ifdef CLI11_CPP14
6479 Option *add_flag(
6480 std::string flag_name,
6481 std::function<void(std::int64_t)> function,
6482 std::string flag_description = "") {
6483 return add_flag_function(std::move(flag_name), std::move(function),
6484 std::move(flag_description));
6485 }
6486#endif
6487
6489 Option *set_config(std::string option_name = "",
6490 std::string default_filename = "",
6491 const std::string &help_message = "Read an ini file",
6492 bool config_required = false);
6493
6495 bool remove_option(Option *opt);
6496
6498 template <typename T = Option_group>
6499 T *add_option_group(std::string group_name, std::string group_description = "") {
6500 if (!detail::valid_alias_name_string(group_name)) {
6501 throw IncorrectConstruction(
6502 "option group names may not contain newlines or null characters");
6503 }
6504 auto option_group = std::make_shared<T>(std::move(group_description), group_name, this);
6505 auto *ptr = option_group.get();
6506 // move to App_p for overload resolution on older gcc versions
6507 App_p app_ptr = std::dynamic_pointer_cast<App>(option_group);
6508 add_subcommand(std::move(app_ptr));
6509 return ptr;
6510 }

6535
6537 CLI::App_p get_subcommand_ptr(App *subcom) const;
6538

6541
6543 CLI11_NODISCARD CLI::App_p get_subcommand_ptr(int index = 0) const;
6544

6562
6564 App *require_subcommand() {
6565 require_subcommand_min_ = 1;
6566 require_subcommand_max_ = 0;
6567 return this;
6568 }
6569
6573 App *require_subcommand(int value) {
6574 if (value < 0) {
6575 require_subcommand_min_ = 0;
6576 require_subcommand_max_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(-value);
6577 } else {
6578 require_subcommand_min_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(value);
6579 require_subcommand_max_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(value);
6580 }
6581 return this;
6582 }
6583
6586 App *require_subcommand(std::size_t min, std::size_t max) {
6587 require_subcommand_min_ = min;
6588 require_subcommand_max_ = max;
6589 return this;
6590 }
6591
6593 App *require_option() {
6594 require_option_min_ = 1;
6595 require_option_max_ = 0;
6596 return this;
6597 }
6598
6602 App *require_option(int value) {
6603 if (value < 0) {
6604 require_option_min_ = 0;
6605 require_option_max_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(-value);
6606 } else {
6607 require_option_min_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(value);
6608 require_option_max_ = static_cast<std::size_t>(value);
6609 }
6610 return this;
6611 }
6612
6615 App *require_option(std::size_t min, std::size_t max) {
6616 require_option_min_ = min;
6617 require_option_max_ = max;
6618 return this;
6619 }

6624 fallthrough_ = value;
6625 return this;
6626 }

6681 CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t count(std::string option_name) const {
6682 return get_option(option_name)->count();
6683 }
6684
6687 CLI11_NODISCARD std::vector<App *> get_subcommands() const { return parsed_subcommands_; }

6696
6698 bool got_subcommand(const App *subcom) const {
6699 // get subcom needed to verify that this was a real subcommand
6700 return get_subcommand(subcom)->parsed_ > 0;
6701 }
6702
6704 CLI11_NODISCARD bool got_subcommand(std::string subcommand_name) const {
6705 return get_subcommand(subcommand_name)->parsed_ > 0;
6706 }
6707
6709 App *excludes(Option *opt) {
6710 if (opt == nullptr) {
6711 throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
6712 }
6713 exclude_options_.insert(opt);
6714 return this;
6715 }
6716
6718 App *excludes(App *app) {
6719 if (app == nullptr) {
6720 throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
6721 }
6722 if (app == this) {
6723 throw OptionNotFound("cannot self reference in needs");
6724 }
6725 auto res = exclude_subcommands_.insert(app);
6726 // subcommand exclusion should be symmetric
6727 if (res.second) {
6728 app->exclude_subcommands_.insert(this);
6729 }
6730 return this;
6731 }
6732
6733 App *needs(Option *opt) {
6734 if (opt == nullptr) {
6735 throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
6736 }
6737 need_options_.insert(opt);
6738 return this;
6739 }
6740
6741 App *needs(App *app) {
6742 if (app == nullptr) {
6743 throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
6744 }
6745 if (app == this) {
6746 throw OptionNotFound("cannot self reference in needs");
6747 }
6748 need_subcommands_.insert(app);
6749 return this;
6750 }
6751
6753 bool remove_excludes(Option *opt);
6754
6756 bool remove_excludes(App *app);
6757
6759 bool remove_needs(Option *opt);
6760
6762 bool remove_needs(App *app);
6766
6768 App *footer(std::string footer_string) {
6769 footer_ = std::move(footer_string);
6770 return this;
6771 }
6773 App *footer(std::function<std::string()> footer_function) {
6774 footer_callback_ = std::move(footer_function);
6775 return this;
6776 }
6780 CLI11_NODISCARD std::string config_to_str(bool default_also = false,
6781 bool write_description = false) const {
6782 return config_formatter_->to_config(this, default_also, write_description, "");
6783 }

6787 CLI11_NODISCARD std::string help(std::string prev = "",
6788 AppFormatMode mode = AppFormatMode::Normal) const;
6789
6791 CLI11_NODISCARD std::string version() const;

6797 CLI11_NODISCARD std::shared_ptr<FormatterBase> get_formatter() const { return formatter_; }
6798
6800 CLI11_NODISCARD std::shared_ptr<Config> get_config_formatter() const {
6801 return config_formatter_;
6802 }
6803
6805 CLI11_NODISCARD std::shared_ptr<ConfigBase> get_config_formatter_base() const {
6806 // This is safer as a dynamic_cast if we have RTTI, as Config -> ConfigBase
6807#if CLI11_USE_STATIC_RTTI == 0
6808 return std::dynamic_pointer_cast<ConfigBase>(config_formatter_);
6809#else
6810 return std::static_pointer_cast<ConfigBase>(config_formatter_);
6811#endif
6812 }

6815 CLI11_NODISCARD std::string get_description() const { return description_; }

6819 description_ = std::move(app_description);
6820 return this;
6821 }

6825 std::vector<const Option *> get_options(
6826 const std::function<bool(const Option *)> filter = {}) const;
6827
6829 std::vector<Option *> get_options(const std::function<bool(Option *)> filter = {});
6830
6832 Option *get_option_no_throw(std::string option_name) noexcept;
6833
6835 CLI11_NODISCARD const Option *get_option_no_throw(std::string option_name) const noexcept;
6836
6838 CLI11_NODISCARD const Option *get_option(std::string option_name) const {
6839 const auto *opt = get_option_no_throw(option_name);
6840 if (opt == nullptr) {
6841 throw OptionNotFound(option_name);
6842 }
6843 return opt;
6844 }
6845
6847 Option *get_option(std::string option_name) {
6848 auto *opt = get_option_no_throw(option_name);
6849 if (opt == nullptr) {
6850 throw OptionNotFound(option_name);
6851 }
6852 return opt;
6853 }
6854
6856 const Option *operator[](const std::string &option_name) const {
6857 return get_option(option_name);
6858 }
6859
6861 const Option *operator[](const char *option_name) const { return get_option(option_name); }

6864 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_ignore_case() const { return ignore_case_; }
6865
6867 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_ignore_underscore() const { return ignore_underscore_; }
6868
6870 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_fallthrough() const { return fallthrough_; }
6871
6873 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_allow_windows_style_options() const {
6874 return allow_windows_style_options_;
6875 }
6876
6878 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_positionals_at_end() const { return positionals_at_end_; }
6879
6881 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_configurable() const { return configurable_; }
6882
6884 CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &get_group() const { return group_; }
6885
6887 CLI11_NODISCARD std::string get_footer() const {
6888 return (footer_callback_) ? footer_callback_() + '\n' + footer_ : footer_;
6889 }

6892 CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t get_require_subcommand_min() const {
6893 return require_subcommand_min_;
6894 }

6898 return require_subcommand_max_;
6899 }
6900
6902 CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t get_require_option_min() const { return require_option_min_; }
6903
6905 CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t get_require_option_max() const { return require_option_max_; }
6906
6908 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_prefix_command() const { return prefix_command_; }
6909
6911 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_allow_extras() const { return allow_extras_; }
6912
6914 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_required() const { return required_; }
6915
6917 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_disabled() const { return disabled_; }
6918
6920 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_silent() const { return silent_; }
6921
6923 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_immediate_callback() const { return immediate_callback_; }
6924
6926 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_disabled_by_default() const {
6927 return (default_startup == startup_mode::disabled);
6928 }
6929
6931 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_enabled_by_default() const {
6932 return (default_startup == startup_mode::enabled);
6933 }
6935 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_validate_positionals() const { return validate_positionals_; }
6937 CLI11_NODISCARD bool get_validate_optional_arguments() const {
6938 return validate_optional_arguments_;
6939 }
6940
6942 CLI11_NODISCARD config_extras_mode get_allow_config_extras() const {
6943 return allow_config_extras_;
6944 }
6945
6947 Option *get_help_ptr() { return help_ptr_; }
6948
6950 CLI11_NODISCARD const Option *get_help_ptr() const { return help_ptr_; }
6951
6953 CLI11_NODISCARD const Option *get_help_all_ptr() const { return help_all_ptr_; }
6954
6956 Option *get_config_ptr() { return config_ptr_; }
6957
6959 CLI11_NODISCARD const Option *get_config_ptr() const { return config_ptr_; }
6960
6962 Option *get_version_ptr() { return version_ptr_; }
6963
6965 CLI11_NODISCARD const Option *get_version_ptr() const { return version_ptr_; }
6966
6968 App *get_parent() { return parent_; }
6969
6971 CLI11_NODISCARD const App *get_parent() const { return parent_; }
6972
6974 CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &get_name() const { return name_; }
6975
6977 CLI11_NODISCARD const std::vector<std::string> &get_aliases() const { return aliases_; }
6978
6980 App *clear_aliases() {
6981 aliases_.clear();
6982 return this;
6983 }
6984
6986 CLI11_NODISCARD std::string get_display_name(bool with_aliases = false) const;
6987
6989 CLI11_NODISCARD bool check_name(std::string name_to_check) const;
6990
6992 CLI11_NODISCARD std::vector<std::string> get_groups() const;
6993
6995 CLI11_NODISCARD const std::vector<Option *> &parse_order() const { return parse_order_; }
6996
6998 CLI11_NODISCARD std::vector<std::string> remaining(bool recurse = false) const;
6999
7002 CLI11_NODISCARD std::vector<std::string> remaining_for_passthrough(bool recurse = false) const;
7003
7005 CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t remaining_size(bool recurse = false) const;
7006
7008
7009protected:
7014 void _validate() const;
7015
7019 void _configure();
7020
7022 void run_callback(bool final_mode = false, bool suppress_final_callback = false);
7023
7026 CLI11_NODISCARD bool _valid_subcommand(const std::string &current,
7027 bool ignore_used = true) const;
7028
7030 CLI11_NODISCARD detail::Classifier _recognize(const std::string &current,
7031 bool ignore_used_subcommands = true) const;
7032
7033 // The parse function is now broken into several parts, and part of process
7034
7036 void _process_config_file();
7037
7039 void _process_env();
7040
7042 void _process_callbacks();
7043
7047 void _process_help_flags(bool trigger_help = false, bool trigger_all_help = false) const;
7048
7050 void _process_requirements();
7051
7053 void _process();
7054
7056 void _process_extras();
7057
7060 void _process_extras(std::vector<std::string> &args);
7061
7064 void increment_parsed();
7065
7067 void _parse(std::vector<std::string> &args);
7068
7070 void _parse(std::vector<std::string> &&args);
7071
7073 void _parse_stream(std::istream &input);
7074
7080 void _parse_config(const std::vector<ConfigItem> &args);
7081
7083 bool _parse_single_config(const ConfigItem &item, std::size_t level = 0);
7084
7088 bool _parse_single(std::vector<std::string> &args, bool &positional_only);
7089
7091 CLI11_NODISCARD std::size_t _count_remaining_positionals(bool required_only = false) const;
7092
7094 CLI11_NODISCARD bool _has_remaining_positionals() const;
7095
7099 bool _parse_positional(std::vector<std::string> &args, bool haltOnSubcommand);
7100
7103 CLI11_NODISCARD App *_find_subcommand(const std::string &subc_name,
7104 bool ignore_disabled,
7105 bool ignore_used) const noexcept;
7106
7111 bool _parse_subcommand(std::vector<std::string> &args);
7112
7115 bool _parse_arg(std::vector<std::string> &args, detail::Classifier current_type);
7116
7118 void _trigger_pre_parse(std::size_t remaining_args);
7119
7122 App *_get_fallthrough_parent();
7123
7126 CLI11_NODISCARD const std::string &_compare_subcommand_names(const App &subcom,
7127 const App &base) const;
7128
7130 void _move_to_missing(detail::Classifier val_type, const std::string &val);
7131
7132public:
7134 void _move_option(Option *opt, App *app);
7135}; // namespace CLI
7136
7138class Option_group : public App {
7139public:
7140 Option_group(std::string group_description, std::string group_name, App *parent)
7141 : App(std::move(group_description), "", parent) {
7142 group(group_name);
7143 // option groups should have automatic fallthrough
7144 }
7145 using App::add_option;
7147 Option *add_option(Option *opt) {
7148 if (get_parent() == nullptr) {
7149 throw OptionNotFound("Unable to locate the specified option");
7150 }
7151 get_parent()->_move_option(opt, this);
7152 return opt;
7153 }
7155 void add_options(Option *opt) { add_option(opt); }
7157 template <typename... Args>
7158 void add_options(Option *opt, Args... args) {
7159 add_option(opt);
7160 add_options(args...);
7161 }
7162 using App::add_subcommand;
7164 App *add_subcommand(App *subcom) {
7165 App_p subc = subcom->get_parent()->get_subcommand_ptr(subcom);
7166 subc->get_parent()->remove_subcommand(subcom);
7167 add_subcommand(std::move(subc));
7168 return subcom;
7169 }
7170};
7171
7173CLI11_INLINE void TriggerOn(App *trigger_app, App *app_to_enable);
7174
7176CLI11_INLINE void TriggerOn(App *trigger_app, std::vector<App *> apps_to_enable);
7177
7179CLI11_INLINE void TriggerOff(App *trigger_app, App *app_to_enable);
7180
7182CLI11_INLINE void TriggerOff(App *trigger_app, std::vector<App *> apps_to_enable);
7183
7185CLI11_INLINE void deprecate_option(Option *opt, const std::string &replacement = "");
7186
7188inline void deprecate_option(App *app,
7189 const std::string &option_name,
7190 const std::string &replacement = "") {
7191 auto *opt = app->get_option(option_name);
7192 deprecate_option(opt, replacement);
7193}
7194
7196inline void deprecate_option(App &app,
7197 const std::string &option_name,
7198 const std::string &replacement = "") {
7199 auto *opt = app.get_option(option_name);
7200 deprecate_option(opt, replacement);
7201}
7202
7204CLI11_INLINE void retire_option(App *app, Option *opt);
7205
7207CLI11_INLINE void retire_option(App &app, Option *opt);
7208
7210CLI11_INLINE void retire_option(App *app, const std::string &option_name);
7211
7213CLI11_INLINE void retire_option(App &app, const std::string &option_name);
7214
7215namespace FailureMessage {
7216
7218CLI11_INLINE std::string simple(const App *app, const Error &e);
7219
7221CLI11_INLINE std::string help(const App *app, const Error &e);
7222
7223} // namespace FailureMessage
7224
7225namespace detail {
7227struct AppFriend {
7228#ifdef CLI11_CPP14
7229
7231 template <typename... Args>
7232 static decltype(auto) parse_arg(App *app, Args &&...args) {
7233 return app->_parse_arg(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7234 }
7235
7237 template <typename... Args>
7238 static decltype(auto) parse_subcommand(App *app, Args &&...args) {
7239 return app->_parse_subcommand(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7240 }
7241#else
7243 template <typename... Args>
7244 static auto parse_arg(App *app, Args &&...args) ->
7245 typename std::result_of<decltype (&App::_parse_arg)(App, Args...)>::type {
7246 return app->_parse_arg(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7247 }
7248
7250 template <typename... Args>
7251 static auto parse_subcommand(App *app, Args &&...args) ->
7252 typename std::result_of<decltype (&App::_parse_subcommand)(App, Args...)>::type {
7253 return app->_parse_subcommand(std::forward<Args>(args)...);
7254 }
7255#endif
7257 static App *get_fallthrough_parent(App *app) { return app->_get_fallthrough_parent(); }
7258};
7259} // namespace detail
7260
7261CLI11_INLINE App::App(std::string app_description, std::string app_name, App *parent)
7262 : name_(std::move(app_name)), description_(std::move(app_description)), parent_(parent) {
7263 // Inherit if not from a nullptr
7264 if (parent_ != nullptr) {
7265 if (parent_->help_ptr_ != nullptr)
7266 set_help_flag(parent_->help_ptr_->get_name(false, true),
7267 parent_->help_ptr_->get_description());
7268 if (parent_->help_all_ptr_ != nullptr)
7269 set_help_all_flag(parent_->help_all_ptr_->get_name(false, true),
7270 parent_->help_all_ptr_->get_description());
7271
7273 option_defaults_ = parent_->option_defaults_;
7274
7275 // INHERITABLE
7276 failure_message_ = parent_->failure_message_;
7277 allow_extras_ = parent_->allow_extras_;
7278 allow_config_extras_ = parent_->allow_config_extras_;
7279 prefix_command_ = parent_->prefix_command_;
7280 immediate_callback_ = parent_->immediate_callback_;
7281 ignore_case_ = parent_->ignore_case_;
7282 ignore_underscore_ = parent_->ignore_underscore_;
7283 fallthrough_ = parent_->fallthrough_;
7284 validate_positionals_ = parent_->validate_positionals_;
7285 validate_optional_arguments_ = parent_->validate_optional_arguments_;
7286 configurable_ = parent_->configurable_;
7287 allow_windows_style_options_ = parent_->allow_windows_style_options_;
7288 group_ = parent_->group_;
7289 footer_ = parent_->footer_;
7290 formatter_ = parent_->formatter_;
7291 config_formatter_ = parent_->config_formatter_;
7292 require_subcommand_max_ = parent_->require_subcommand_max_;
7293 }
7294}
7295
7296CLI11_INLINE App *App::name(std::string app_name) {
7297 if (parent_ != nullptr) {
7298 auto oname = name_;
7299 name_ = app_name;
7300 const auto &res = _compare_subcommand_names(*this, *_get_fallthrough_parent());
7301 if (!res.empty()) {
7302 name_ = oname;
7303 throw(OptionAlreadyAdded(app_name + " conflicts with existing subcommand names"));
7304 }
7305 } else {
7306 name_ = app_name;
7307 }
7308 has_automatic_name_ = false;
7309 return this;
7310}
7311
7312CLI11_INLINE App *App::alias(std::string app_name) {
7313 if (app_name.empty() || !detail::valid_alias_name_string(app_name)) {
7314 throw IncorrectConstruction(
7315 "Aliases may not be empty or contain newlines or null characters");
7316 }
7317 if (parent_ != nullptr) {
7318 aliases_.push_back(app_name);
7319 const auto &res = _compare_subcommand_names(*this, *_get_fallthrough_parent());
7320 if (!res.empty()) {
7321 aliases_.pop_back();
7322 throw(OptionAlreadyAdded("alias already matches an existing subcommand: " + app_name));
7323 }
7324 } else {
7325 aliases_.push_back(app_name);
7326 }
7327
7328 return this;
7329}
7330
7331CLI11_INLINE App *App::immediate_callback(bool immediate) {
7332 immediate_callback_ = immediate;
7333 if (immediate_callback_) {
7334 if (final_callback_ && !(parse_complete_callback_)) {
7335 std::swap(final_callback_, parse_complete_callback_);
7336 }
7337 } else if (!(final_callback_) && parse_complete_callback_) {
7338 std::swap(final_callback_, parse_complete_callback_);
7339 }
7340 return this;
7341}
7342
7343CLI11_INLINE App *App::ignore_case(bool value) {
7344 if (value && !ignore_case_) {
7345 ignore_case_ = true;
7346 auto *p = (parent_ != nullptr) ? _get_fallthrough_parent() : this;
7347 const auto &match = _compare_subcommand_names(*this, *p);
7348 if (!match.empty()) {
7349 ignore_case_ = false; // we are throwing so need to be exception invariant
7350 throw OptionAlreadyAdded("ignore case would cause subcommand name conflicts: " + match);
7351 }
7352 }
7353 ignore_case_ = value;
7354 return this;
7355}
7356
7357CLI11_INLINE App *App::ignore_underscore(bool value) {
7358 if (value && !ignore_underscore_) {
7359 ignore_underscore_ = true;
7360 auto *p = (parent_ != nullptr) ? _get_fallthrough_parent() : this;
7361 const auto &match = _compare_subcommand_names(*this, *p);
7362 if (!match.empty()) {
7363 ignore_underscore_ = false;
7364 throw OptionAlreadyAdded("ignore underscore would cause subcommand name conflicts: " +
7365 match);
7366 }
7367 }
7368 ignore_underscore_ = value;
7369 return this;
7370}
7371
7372CLI11_INLINE Option *App::add_option(std::string option_name,
7373 callback_t option_callback,
7374 std::string option_description,
7375 bool defaulted,
7376 std::function<std::string()> func) {
7377 Option myopt{option_name, option_description, option_callback, this};
7378
7379 if (std::find_if(std::begin(options_), std::end(options_),
7380 [&myopt](const Option_p &v) { return *v == myopt; }) == std::end(options_)) {
7381 options_.emplace_back();
7382 Option_p &option = options_.back();
7383 option.reset(new Option(option_name, option_description, option_callback, this));
7384
7385 // Set the default string capture function
7386 option->default_function(func);
7387
7388 // For compatibility with CLI11 1.7 and before, capture the default string here
7389 if (defaulted) option->capture_default_str();
7390
7391 // Transfer defaults to the new option
7392 option_defaults_.copy_to(option.get());
7393
7394 // Don't bother to capture if we already did
7395 if (!defaulted && option->get_always_capture_default()) option->capture_default_str();
7396
7397 return option.get();
7398 }
7399 // we know something matches now find what it is so we can produce more error information
7400 for (auto &opt : options_) {
7401 const auto &matchname = opt->matching_name(myopt);
7402 if (!matchname.empty()) {
7403 throw(OptionAlreadyAdded("added option matched existing option name: " + matchname));
7404 }
7405 }
7406 // this line should not be reached the above loop should trigger the throw
7407 throw(OptionAlreadyAdded("added option matched existing option name")); // LCOV_EXCL_LINE
7408}
7409
7410CLI11_INLINE Option *App::set_help_flag(std::string flag_name,
7411 const std::string &help_description) {
7412 // take flag_description by const reference otherwise add_flag tries to assign to
7413 // help_description
7414 if (help_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7415 remove_option(help_ptr_);
7416 help_ptr_ = nullptr;
7417 }
7418
7419 // Empty name will simply remove the help flag
7420 if (!flag_name.empty()) {
7421 help_ptr_ = add_flag(flag_name, help_description);
7422 help_ptr_->configurable(false);
7423 }
7424
7425 return help_ptr_;
7426}
7427
7428CLI11_INLINE Option *App::set_help_all_flag(std::string help_name,
7429 const std::string &help_description) {
7430 // take flag_description by const reference otherwise add_flag tries to assign to
7431 // flag_description
7432 if (help_all_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7433 remove_option(help_all_ptr_);
7434 help_all_ptr_ = nullptr;
7435 }
7436
7437 // Empty name will simply remove the help all flag
7438 if (!help_name.empty()) {
7439 help_all_ptr_ = add_flag(help_name, help_description);
7440 help_all_ptr_->configurable(false);
7441 }
7442
7443 return help_all_ptr_;
7444}
7445
7446CLI11_INLINE Option *App::set_version_flag(std::string flag_name,
7447 const std::string &versionString,
7448 const std::string &version_help) {
7449 // take flag_description by const reference otherwise add_flag tries to assign to
7450 // version_description
7451 if (version_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7452 remove_option(version_ptr_);
7453 version_ptr_ = nullptr;
7454 }
7455
7456 // Empty name will simply remove the version flag
7457 if (!flag_name.empty()) {
7458 version_ptr_ = add_flag_callback(
7459 flag_name, [versionString]() { throw(CLI::CallForVersion(versionString, 0)); },
7460 version_help);
7461 version_ptr_->configurable(false);
7462 }
7463
7464 return version_ptr_;
7465}
7466
7467CLI11_INLINE Option *App::set_version_flag(std::string flag_name,
7468 std::function<std::string()> vfunc,
7469 const std::string &version_help) {
7470 if (version_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7471 remove_option(version_ptr_);
7472 version_ptr_ = nullptr;
7473 }
7474
7475 // Empty name will simply remove the version flag
7476 if (!flag_name.empty()) {
7477 version_ptr_ = add_flag_callback(
7478 flag_name, [vfunc]() { throw(CLI::CallForVersion(vfunc(), 0)); }, version_help);
7479 version_ptr_->configurable(false);
7480 }
7481
7482 return version_ptr_;
7483}
7484
7485CLI11_INLINE Option *App::_add_flag_internal(std::string flag_name,
7486 CLI::callback_t fun,
7487 std::string flag_description) {
7488 Option *opt = nullptr;
7489 if (detail::has_default_flag_values(flag_name)) {
7490 // check for default values and if it has them
7491 auto flag_defaults = detail::get_default_flag_values(flag_name);
7492 detail::remove_default_flag_values(flag_name);
7493 opt = add_option(std::move(flag_name), std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description), false);
7494 for (const auto &fname : flag_defaults) opt->fnames_.push_back(fname.first);
7495 opt->default_flag_values_ = std::move(flag_defaults);
7496 } else {
7497 opt = add_option(std::move(flag_name), std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description), false);
7498 }
7499 // flags cannot have positional values
7500 if (opt->get_positional()) {
7501 auto pos_name = opt->get_name(true);
7502 remove_option(opt);
7503 throw IncorrectConstruction::PositionalFlag(pos_name);
7504 }
7505 opt->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::TakeLast);
7506 opt->expected(0);
7507 opt->required(false);
7508 return opt;
7509}
7510
7511CLI11_INLINE Option *App::add_flag_callback(
7512 std::string flag_name,
7513 std::function<void(void)> function,
7514 std::string flag_description) {
7515 CLI::callback_t fun = [function](const CLI::results_t &res) {
7516 bool trigger{false};
7517 auto result = CLI::detail::lexical_cast(res[0], trigger);
7518 if (result && trigger) {
7519 function();
7520 }
7521 return result;
7522 };
7523 return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description));
7524}
7525
7526CLI11_INLINE Option *App::add_flag_function(
7527 std::string flag_name,
7528 std::function<void(std::int64_t)> function,
7529 std::string flag_description) {
7530 CLI::callback_t fun = [function](const CLI::results_t &res) {
7531 std::int64_t flag_count{0};
7532 CLI::detail::lexical_cast(res[0], flag_count);
7533 function(flag_count);
7534 return true;
7535 };
7536 return _add_flag_internal(flag_name, std::move(fun), std::move(flag_description))
7537 ->multi_option_policy(MultiOptionPolicy::Sum);
7538}
7539
7540CLI11_INLINE Option *App::set_config(std::string option_name,
7541 std::string default_filename,
7542 const std::string &help_message,
7543 bool config_required) {
7544 // Remove existing config if present
7545 if (config_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7546 remove_option(config_ptr_);
7547 config_ptr_ = nullptr; // need to remove the config_ptr completely
7548 }
7549
7550 // Only add config if option passed
7551 if (!option_name.empty()) {
7552 config_ptr_ = add_option(option_name, help_message);
7553 if (config_required) {
7554 config_ptr_->required();
7555 }
7556 if (!default_filename.empty()) {
7557 config_ptr_->default_str(std::move(default_filename));
7558 }
7559 config_ptr_->configurable(false);
7560 }
7561
7562 return config_ptr_;
7563}
7564
7565CLI11_INLINE bool App::remove_option(Option *opt) {
7566 // Make sure no links exist
7567 for (Option_p &op : options_) {
7568 op->remove_needs(opt);
7569 op->remove_excludes(opt);
7570 }
7571
7572 if (help_ptr_ == opt) help_ptr_ = nullptr;
7573 if (help_all_ptr_ == opt) help_all_ptr_ = nullptr;
7574
7575 auto iterator = std::find_if(std::begin(options_), std::end(options_),
7576 [opt](const Option_p &v) { return v.get() == opt; });
7577 if (iterator != std::end(options_)) {
7578 options_.erase(iterator);
7579 return true;
7580 }
7581 return false;
7582}
7583
7584CLI11_INLINE App *App::add_subcommand(std::string subcommand_name,
7585 std::string subcommand_description) {
7586 if (!subcommand_name.empty() && !detail::valid_name_string(subcommand_name)) {
7587 if (!detail::valid_first_char(subcommand_name[0])) {
7588 throw IncorrectConstruction(
7589 "Subcommand name starts with invalid character, '!' and '-' are not allowed");
7590 }
7591 for (auto c : subcommand_name) {
7592 if (!detail::valid_later_char(c)) {
7593 throw IncorrectConstruction(
7594 std::string("Subcommand name contains invalid character ('") + c +
7595 "'), all characters are allowed except"
7596 "'=',':','{','}', and ' '");
7597 }
7598 }
7599 }
7600 CLI::App_p subcom =
7601 std::shared_ptr<App>(new App(std::move(subcommand_description), subcommand_name, this));
7602 return add_subcommand(std::move(subcom));
7603}
7604
7605CLI11_INLINE App *App::add_subcommand(CLI::App_p subcom) {
7606 if (!subcom) throw IncorrectConstruction("passed App is not valid");
7607 auto *ckapp = (name_.empty() && parent_ != nullptr) ? _get_fallthrough_parent() : this;
7608 const auto &mstrg = _compare_subcommand_names(*subcom, *ckapp);
7609 if (!mstrg.empty()) {
7610 throw(OptionAlreadyAdded("subcommand name or alias matches existing subcommand: " + mstrg));
7611 }
7612 subcom->parent_ = this;
7613 subcommands_.push_back(std::move(subcom));
7614 return subcommands_.back().get();
7615}
7616
7617CLI11_INLINE bool App::remove_subcommand(App *subcom) {
7618 // Make sure no links exist
7619 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
7620 sub->remove_excludes(subcom);
7621 sub->remove_needs(subcom);
7622 }
7623
7624 auto iterator = std::find_if(std::begin(subcommands_), std::end(subcommands_),
7625 [subcom](const App_p &v) { return v.get() == subcom; });
7626 if (iterator != std::end(subcommands_)) {
7627 subcommands_.erase(iterator);
7628 return true;
7629 }
7630 return false;
7631}
7632
7633CLI11_INLINE App *App::get_subcommand(const App *subcom) const {
7634 if (subcom == nullptr) throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
7635 for (const App_p &subcomptr : subcommands_)
7636 if (subcomptr.get() == subcom) return subcomptr.get();
7637 throw OptionNotFound(subcom->get_name());
7638}
7639
7640CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE App *App::get_subcommand(std::string subcom) const {
7641 auto *subc = _find_subcommand(subcom, false, false);
7642 if (subc == nullptr) throw OptionNotFound(subcom);
7643 return subc;
7644}
7645
7646CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE App *App::get_subcommand(int index) const {
7647 if (index >= 0) {
7648 auto uindex = static_cast<unsigned>(index);
7649 if (uindex < subcommands_.size()) return subcommands_[uindex].get();
7650 }
7651 throw OptionNotFound(std::to_string(index));
7652}
7653
7654CLI11_INLINE CLI::App_p App::get_subcommand_ptr(App *subcom) const {
7655 if (subcom == nullptr) throw OptionNotFound("nullptr passed");
7656 for (const App_p &subcomptr : subcommands_)
7657 if (subcomptr.get() == subcom) return subcomptr;
7658 throw OptionNotFound(subcom->get_name());
7659}
7660
7661CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE CLI::App_p App::get_subcommand_ptr(std::string subcom) const {
7662 for (const App_p &subcomptr : subcommands_)
7663 if (subcomptr->check_name(subcom)) return subcomptr;
7664 throw OptionNotFound(subcom);
7665}
7666
7667CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE CLI::App_p App::get_subcommand_ptr(int index) const {
7668 if (index >= 0) {
7669 auto uindex = static_cast<unsigned>(index);
7670 if (uindex < subcommands_.size()) return subcommands_[uindex];
7671 }
7672 throw OptionNotFound(std::to_string(index));
7673}
7674
7675CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE CLI::App *App::get_option_group(std::string group_name) const {
7676 for (const App_p &app : subcommands_) {
7677 if (app->name_.empty() && app->group_ == group_name) {
7678 return app.get();
7679 }
7680 }
7681 throw OptionNotFound(group_name);
7682}
7683
7684CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::size_t App::count_all() const {
7685 std::size_t cnt{0};
7686 for (const auto &opt : options_) {
7687 cnt += opt->count();
7688 }
7689 for (const auto &sub : subcommands_) {
7690 cnt += sub->count_all();
7691 }
7692 if (!get_name()
7693 .empty()) { // for named subcommands add the number of times the subcommand was called
7694 cnt += parsed_;
7695 }
7696 return cnt;
7697}
7698
7699CLI11_INLINE void App::clear() {
7700 parsed_ = 0;
7701 pre_parse_called_ = false;
7702
7703 missing_.clear();
7704 parsed_subcommands_.clear();
7705 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
7706 opt->clear();
7707 }
7708 for (const App_p &subc : subcommands_) {
7709 subc->clear();
7710 }
7711}
7712
7713CLI11_INLINE void App::parse(int argc, const char *const *argv) {
7714 // If the name is not set, read from command line
7715 if (name_.empty() || has_automatic_name_) {
7716 has_automatic_name_ = true;
7717 name_ = argv[0];
7718 }
7719
7720 std::vector<std::string> args;
7721 args.reserve(static_cast<std::size_t>(argc) - 1U);
7722 for (auto i = static_cast<std::size_t>(argc) - 1U; i > 0U; --i) args.emplace_back(argv[i]);
7723 parse(std::move(args));
7724}
7725
7726CLI11_INLINE void App::parse(std::string commandline, bool program_name_included) {
7727 if (program_name_included) {
7728 auto nstr = detail::split_program_name(commandline);
7729 if ((name_.empty()) || (has_automatic_name_)) {
7730 has_automatic_name_ = true;
7731 name_ = nstr.first;
7732 }
7733 commandline = std::move(nstr.second);
7734 } else {
7735 detail::trim(commandline);
7736 }
7737 // the next section of code is to deal with quoted arguments after an '=' or ':' for windows
7738 // like operations
7739 if (!commandline.empty()) {
7740 commandline = detail::find_and_modify(commandline, "=", detail::escape_detect);
7741 if (allow_windows_style_options_)
7742 commandline = detail::find_and_modify(commandline, ":", detail::escape_detect);
7743 }
7744
7745 auto args = detail::split_up(std::move(commandline));
7746 // remove all empty strings
7747 args.erase(std::remove(args.begin(), args.end(), std::string{}), args.end());
7748 std::reverse(args.begin(), args.end());
7749
7750 parse(std::move(args));
7751}
7752
7753CLI11_INLINE void App::parse(std::vector<std::string> &args) {
7754 // Clear if parsed
7755 if (parsed_ > 0) clear();
7756
7757 // parsed_ is incremented in commands/subcommands,
7758 // but placed here to make sure this is cleared when
7759 // running parse after an error is thrown, even by _validate or _configure.
7760 parsed_ = 1;
7761 _validate();
7762 _configure();
7763 // set the parent as nullptr as this object should be the top now
7764 parent_ = nullptr;
7765 parsed_ = 0;
7766
7767 _parse(args);
7768 run_callback();
7769}
7770
7771CLI11_INLINE void App::parse(std::vector<std::string> &&args) {
7772 // Clear if parsed
7773 if (parsed_ > 0) clear();
7774
7775 // parsed_ is incremented in commands/subcommands,
7776 // but placed here to make sure this is cleared when
7777 // running parse after an error is thrown, even by _validate or _configure.
7778 parsed_ = 1;
7779 _validate();
7780 _configure();
7781 // set the parent as nullptr as this object should be the top now
7782 parent_ = nullptr;
7783 parsed_ = 0;
7784
7785 _parse(std::move(args));
7786 run_callback();
7787}
7788
7789CLI11_INLINE void App::parse_from_stream(std::istream &input) {
7790 if (parsed_ == 0) {
7791 _validate();
7792 _configure();
7793 // set the parent as nullptr as this object should be the top now
7794 }
7795
7796 _parse_stream(input);
7797 run_callback();
7798}
7799
7800CLI11_INLINE int App::exit(const Error &e, std::ostream &out, std::ostream &err) const {
7802 if (e.get_name() == "RuntimeError") return e.get_exit_code();
7803
7804 if (e.get_name() == "CallForHelp") {
7805 out << help();
7806 return e.get_exit_code();
7807 }
7808
7809 if (e.get_name() == "CallForAllHelp") {
7810 out << help("", AppFormatMode::All);
7811 return e.get_exit_code();
7812 }
7813
7814 if (e.get_name() == "CallForVersion") {
7815 out << e.what() << std::endl;
7816 return e.get_exit_code();
7817 }
7818
7819 if (e.get_exit_code() != static_cast<int>(ExitCodes::Success)) {
7820 if (failure_message_) err << failure_message_(this, e) << std::flush;
7821 }
7822
7823 return e.get_exit_code();
7824}
7825
7826CLI11_INLINE std::vector<const App *> App::get_subcommands(
7827 const std::function<bool(const App *)> &filter) const {
7828 std::vector<const App *> subcomms(subcommands_.size());
7829 std::transform(std::begin(subcommands_), std::end(subcommands_), std::begin(subcomms),
7830 [](const App_p &v) { return v.get(); });
7831
7832 if (filter) {
7833 subcomms.erase(std::remove_if(std::begin(subcomms), std::end(subcomms),
7834 [&filter](const App *app) { return !filter(app); }),
7835 std::end(subcomms));
7836 }
7837
7838 return subcomms;
7839}
7840
7841CLI11_INLINE std::vector<App *> App::get_subcommands(const std::function<bool(App *)> &filter) {
7842 std::vector<App *> subcomms(subcommands_.size());
7843 std::transform(std::begin(subcommands_), std::end(subcommands_), std::begin(subcomms),
7844 [](const App_p &v) { return v.get(); });
7845
7846 if (filter) {
7847 subcomms.erase(std::remove_if(std::begin(subcomms), std::end(subcomms),
7848 [&filter](App *app) { return !filter(app); }),
7849 std::end(subcomms));
7850 }
7851
7852 return subcomms;
7853}
7854
7855CLI11_INLINE bool App::remove_excludes(Option *opt) {
7856 auto iterator = std::find(std::begin(exclude_options_), std::end(exclude_options_), opt);
7857 if (iterator == std::end(exclude_options_)) {
7858 return false;
7859 }
7860 exclude_options_.erase(iterator);
7861 return true;
7862}
7863
7864CLI11_INLINE bool App::remove_excludes(App *app) {
7865 auto iterator =
7866 std::find(std::begin(exclude_subcommands_), std::end(exclude_subcommands_), app);
7867 if (iterator == std::end(exclude_subcommands_)) {
7868 return false;
7869 }
7870 auto *other_app = *iterator;
7871 exclude_subcommands_.erase(iterator);
7872 other_app->remove_excludes(this);
7873 return true;
7874}
7875
7876CLI11_INLINE bool App::remove_needs(Option *opt) {
7877 auto iterator = std::find(std::begin(need_options_), std::end(need_options_), opt);
7878 if (iterator == std::end(need_options_)) {
7879 return false;
7880 }
7881 need_options_.erase(iterator);
7882 return true;
7883}
7884
7885CLI11_INLINE bool App::remove_needs(App *app) {
7886 auto iterator = std::find(std::begin(need_subcommands_), std::end(need_subcommands_), app);
7887 if (iterator == std::end(need_subcommands_)) {
7888 return false;
7889 }
7890 need_subcommands_.erase(iterator);
7891 return true;
7892}
7893
7894CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::string App::help(std::string prev, AppFormatMode mode) const {
7895 if (prev.empty())
7896 prev = get_name();
7897 else
7898 prev += " " + get_name();
7899
7900 // Delegate to subcommand if needed
7901 auto selected_subcommands = get_subcommands();
7902 if (!selected_subcommands.empty()) {
7903 return selected_subcommands.at(0)->help(prev, mode);
7904 }
7905 return formatter_->make_help(this, prev, mode);
7906}
7907
7908CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::string App::version() const {
7909 std::string val;
7910 if (version_ptr_ != nullptr) {
7911 auto rv = version_ptr_->results();
7912 version_ptr_->clear();
7913 version_ptr_->add_result("true");
7914 try {
7915 version_ptr_->run_callback();
7916 } catch (const CLI::CallForVersion &cfv) {
7917 val = cfv.what();
7918 }
7919 version_ptr_->clear();
7920 version_ptr_->add_result(rv);
7921 }
7922 return val;
7923}
7924
7925CLI11_INLINE std::vector<const Option *> App::get_options(
7926 const std::function<bool(const Option *)> filter) const {
7927 std::vector<const Option *> options(options_.size());
7928 std::transform(std::begin(options_), std::end(options_), std::begin(options),
7929 [](const Option_p &val) { return val.get(); });
7930
7931 if (filter) {
7932 options.erase(std::remove_if(std::begin(options), std::end(options),
7933 [&filter](const Option *opt) { return !filter(opt); }),
7934 std::end(options));
7935 }
7936
7937 return options;
7938}
7939
7940CLI11_INLINE std::vector<Option *> App::get_options(const std::function<bool(Option *)> filter) {
7941 std::vector<Option *> options(options_.size());
7942 std::transform(std::begin(options_), std::end(options_), std::begin(options),
7943 [](const Option_p &val) { return val.get(); });
7944
7945 if (filter) {
7946 options.erase(std::remove_if(std::begin(options), std::end(options),
7947 [&filter](Option *opt) { return !filter(opt); }),
7948 std::end(options));
7949 }
7950
7951 return options;
7952}
7953
7954CLI11_INLINE Option *App::get_option_no_throw(std::string option_name) noexcept {
7955 for (Option_p &opt : options_) {
7956 if (opt->check_name(option_name)) {
7957 return opt.get();
7958 }
7959 }
7960 for (auto &subc : subcommands_) {
7961 // also check down into nameless subcommands
7962 if (subc->get_name().empty()) {
7963 auto *opt = subc->get_option_no_throw(option_name);
7964 if (opt != nullptr) {
7965 return opt;
7966 }
7967 }
7968 }
7969 return nullptr;
7970}
7971
7972CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE const Option *App::get_option_no_throw(
7973 std::string option_name) const noexcept {
7974 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
7975 if (opt->check_name(option_name)) {
7976 return opt.get();
7977 }
7978 }
7979 for (const auto &subc : subcommands_) {
7980 // also check down into nameless subcommands
7981 if (subc->get_name().empty()) {
7982 auto *opt = subc->get_option_no_throw(option_name);
7983 if (opt != nullptr) {
7984 return opt;
7985 }
7986 }
7987 }
7988 return nullptr;
7989}
7990
7991CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::string App::get_display_name(bool with_aliases) const {
7992 if (name_.empty()) {
7993 return std::string("[Option Group: ") + get_group() + "]";
7994 }
7995 if (aliases_.empty() || !with_aliases) {
7996 return name_;
7997 }
7998 std::string dispname = name_;
7999 for (const auto &lalias : aliases_) {
8000 dispname.push_back(',');
8001 dispname.push_back(' ');
8002 dispname.append(lalias);
8003 }
8004 return dispname;
8005}
8006
8007CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE bool App::check_name(std::string name_to_check) const {
8008 std::string local_name = name_;
8009 if (ignore_underscore_) {
8010 local_name = detail::remove_underscore(name_);
8011 name_to_check = detail::remove_underscore(name_to_check);
8012 }
8013 if (ignore_case_) {
8014 local_name = detail::to_lower(name_);
8015 name_to_check = detail::to_lower(name_to_check);
8016 }
8017
8018 if (local_name == name_to_check) {
8019 return true;
8020 }
8021 for (auto les : aliases_) { // NOLINT(performance-for-range-copy)
8022 if (ignore_underscore_) {
8023 les = detail::remove_underscore(les);
8024 }
8025 if (ignore_case_) {
8026 les = detail::to_lower(les);
8027 }
8028 if (les == name_to_check) {
8029 return true;
8030 }
8031 }
8032 return false;
8033}
8034
8035CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::vector<std::string> App::get_groups() const {
8036 std::vector<std::string> groups;
8037
8038 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
8039 // Add group if it is not already in there
8040 if (std::find(groups.begin(), groups.end(), opt->get_group()) == groups.end()) {
8041 groups.push_back(opt->get_group());
8042 }
8043 }
8044
8045 return groups;
8046}
8047
8048CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::vector<std::string> App::remaining(bool recurse) const {
8049 std::vector<std::string> miss_list;
8050 for (const std::pair<detail::Classifier, std::string> &miss : missing_) {
8051 miss_list.push_back(std::get<1>(miss));
8052 }
8053 // Get from a subcommand that may allow extras
8054 if (recurse) {
8055 if (!allow_extras_) {
8056 for (const auto &sub : subcommands_) {
8057 if (sub->name_.empty() && !sub->missing_.empty()) {
8058 for (const std::pair<detail::Classifier, std::string> &miss : sub->missing_) {
8059 miss_list.push_back(std::get<1>(miss));
8060 }
8061 }
8062 }
8063 }
8064 // Recurse into subcommands
8065
8066 for (const App *sub : parsed_subcommands_) {
8067 std::vector<std::string> output = sub->remaining(recurse);
8068 std::copy(std::begin(output), std::end(output), std::back_inserter(miss_list));
8069 }
8070 }
8071 return miss_list;
8072}
8073
8074CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::vector<std::string> App::remaining_for_passthrough(
8075 bool recurse) const {
8076 std::vector<std::string> miss_list = remaining(recurse);
8077 std::reverse(std::begin(miss_list), std::end(miss_list));
8078 return miss_list;
8079}
8080
8081CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::size_t App::remaining_size(bool recurse) const {
8082 auto remaining_options = static_cast<std::size_t>(
8083 std::count_if(std::begin(missing_), std::end(missing_),
8084 [](const std::pair<detail::Classifier, std::string> &val) {
8085 return val.first != detail::Classifier::POSITIONAL_MARK;
8086 }));
8087
8088 if (recurse) {
8089 for (const App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8090 remaining_options += sub->remaining_size(recurse);
8091 }
8092 }
8093 return remaining_options;
8094}
8095
8096CLI11_INLINE void App::_validate() const {
8097 // count the number of positional only args
8098 auto pcount = std::count_if(std::begin(options_), std::end(options_), [](const Option_p &opt) {
8099 return opt->get_items_expected_max() >= detail::expected_max_vector_size &&
8100 !opt->nonpositional();
8101 });
8102 if (pcount > 1) {
8103 auto pcount_req =
8104 std::count_if(std::begin(options_), std::end(options_), [](const Option_p &opt) {
8105 return opt->get_items_expected_max() >= detail::expected_max_vector_size &&
8106 !opt->nonpositional() && opt->get_required();
8107 });
8108 if (pcount - pcount_req > 1) {
8109 throw InvalidError(name_);
8110 }
8111 }
8112
8113 std::size_t nameless_subs{0};
8114 for (const App_p &app : subcommands_) {
8115 app->_validate();
8116 if (app->get_name().empty()) ++nameless_subs;
8117 }
8118
8119 if (require_option_min_ > 0) {
8120 if (require_option_max_ > 0) {
8121 if (require_option_max_ < require_option_min_) {
8122 throw(InvalidError("Required min options greater than required max options",
8123 ExitCodes::InvalidError));
8124 }
8125 }
8126 if (require_option_min_ > (options_.size() + nameless_subs)) {
8127 throw(InvalidError("Required min options greater than number of available options",
8128 ExitCodes::InvalidError));
8129 }
8130 }
8131}
8132
8133CLI11_INLINE void App::_configure() {
8134 if (default_startup == startup_mode::enabled) {
8135 disabled_ = false;
8136 } else if (default_startup == startup_mode::disabled) {
8137 disabled_ = true;
8138 }
8139 for (const App_p &app : subcommands_) {
8140 if (app->has_automatic_name_) {
8141 app->name_.clear();
8142 }
8143 if (app->name_.empty()) {
8144 app->fallthrough_ = false; // make sure fallthrough_ is false to prevent infinite loop
8145 app->prefix_command_ = false;
8146 }
8147 // make sure the parent is set to be this object in preparation for parse
8148 app->parent_ = this;
8149 app->_configure();
8150 }
8151}
8152
8153CLI11_INLINE void App::run_callback(bool final_mode, bool suppress_final_callback) {
8154 pre_callback();
8155 // in the main app if immediate_callback_ is set it runs the main callback before the used
8156 // subcommands
8157 if (!final_mode && parse_complete_callback_) {
8158 parse_complete_callback_();
8159 }
8160 // run the callbacks for the received subcommands
8161 for (App *subc : get_subcommands()) {
8162 if (subc->parent_ == this) {
8163 subc->run_callback(true, suppress_final_callback);
8164 }
8165 }
8166 // now run callbacks for option_groups
8167 for (auto &subc : subcommands_) {
8168 if (subc->name_.empty() && subc->count_all() > 0) {
8169 subc->run_callback(true, suppress_final_callback);
8170 }
8171 }
8172
8173 // finally run the main callback
8174 if (final_callback_ && (parsed_ > 0) && (!suppress_final_callback)) {
8175 if (!name_.empty() || count_all() > 0 || parent_ == nullptr) {
8176 final_callback_();
8177 }
8178 }
8179}
8180
8181CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE bool App::_valid_subcommand(const std::string &current,
8182 bool ignore_used) const {
8183 // Don't match if max has been reached - but still check parents
8184 if (require_subcommand_max_ != 0 && parsed_subcommands_.size() >= require_subcommand_max_) {
8185 return parent_ != nullptr && parent_->_valid_subcommand(current, ignore_used);
8186 }
8187 auto *com = _find_subcommand(current, true, ignore_used);
8188 if (com != nullptr) {
8189 return true;
8190 }
8191 // Check parent if exists, else return false
8192 return parent_ != nullptr && parent_->_valid_subcommand(current, ignore_used);
8193}
8194
8195CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE detail::Classifier App::_recognize(
8196 const std::string &current, bool ignore_used_subcommands) const {
8197 std::string dummy1, dummy2;
8198
8199 if (current == "--") return detail::Classifier::POSITIONAL_MARK;
8200 if (_valid_subcommand(current, ignore_used_subcommands)) return detail::Classifier::SUBCOMMAND;
8201 if (detail::split_long(current, dummy1, dummy2)) return detail::Classifier::LONG;
8202 if (detail::split_short(current, dummy1, dummy2)) {
8203 if (dummy1[0] >= '0' && dummy1[0] <= '9') {
8204 if (get_option_no_throw(std::string{'-', dummy1[0]}) == nullptr) {
8205 return detail::Classifier::NONE;
8206 }
8207 }
8208 return detail::Classifier::SHORT;
8209 }
8210 if ((allow_windows_style_options_) && (detail::split_windows_style(current, dummy1, dummy2)))
8211 return detail::Classifier::WINDOWS_STYLE;
8212 if ((current == "++") && !name_.empty() && parent_ != nullptr)
8213 return detail::Classifier::SUBCOMMAND_TERMINATOR;
8214 return detail::Classifier::NONE;
8215}
8216
8217CLI11_INLINE void App::_process_config_file() {
8218 if (config_ptr_ != nullptr) {
8219 bool config_required = config_ptr_->get_required();
8220 auto file_given = config_ptr_->count() > 0;
8221 auto config_files = config_ptr_->as<std::vector<std::string>>();
8222 if (config_files.empty() || config_files.front().empty()) {
8223 if (config_required) {
8224 throw FileError::Missing("no specified config file");
8225 }
8226 return;
8227 }
8228 for (auto rit = config_files.rbegin(); rit != config_files.rend(); ++rit) {
8229 const auto &config_file = *rit;
8230 auto path_result = detail::check_path(config_file.c_str());
8231 if (path_result == detail::path_type::file) {
8232 try {
8233 std::vector<ConfigItem> values = config_formatter_->from_file(config_file);
8234 _parse_config(values);
8235 if (!file_given) {
8236 config_ptr_->add_result(config_file);
8237 }
8238 } catch (const FileError &) {
8239 if (config_required || file_given) throw;
8240 }
8241 } else if (config_required || file_given) {
8242 throw FileError::Missing(config_file);
8243 }
8244 }
8245 }
8246}
8247
8248CLI11_INLINE void App::_process_env() {
8249 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
8250 if (opt->count() == 0 && !opt->envname_.empty()) {
8251 char *buffer = nullptr;
8252 std::string ename_string;
8253
8254#ifdef _MSC_VER
8255 // Windows version
8256 std::size_t sz = 0;
8257 if (_dupenv_s(&buffer, &sz, opt->envname_.c_str()) == 0 && buffer != nullptr) {
8258 ename_string = std::string(buffer);
8259 free(buffer);
8260 }
8261#else
8262 // This also works on Windows, but gives a warning
8263 buffer = std::getenv(opt->envname_.c_str());
8264 if (buffer != nullptr) ename_string = std::string(buffer);
8265#endif
8266
8267 if (!ename_string.empty()) {
8268 opt->add_result(ename_string);
8269 }
8270 }
8271 }
8272
8273 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8274 if (sub->get_name().empty() || !sub->parse_complete_callback_) sub->_process_env();
8275 }
8276}
8277
8278CLI11_INLINE void App::_process_callbacks() {
8279 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8280 // process the priority option_groups first
8281 if (sub->get_name().empty() && sub->parse_complete_callback_) {
8282 if (sub->count_all() > 0) {
8283 sub->_process_callbacks();
8284 sub->run_callback();
8285 }
8286 }
8287 }
8288
8289 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
8290 if ((*opt) && !opt->get_callback_run()) {
8291 opt->run_callback();
8292 }
8293 }
8294 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8295 if (!sub->parse_complete_callback_) {
8296 sub->_process_callbacks();
8297 }
8298 }
8299}
8300
8301CLI11_INLINE void App::_process_help_flags(bool trigger_help, bool trigger_all_help) const {
8302 const Option *help_ptr = get_help_ptr();
8303 const Option *help_all_ptr = get_help_all_ptr();
8304
8305 if (help_ptr != nullptr && help_ptr->count() > 0) trigger_help = true;
8306 if (help_all_ptr != nullptr && help_all_ptr->count() > 0) trigger_all_help = true;
8307
8308 // If there were parsed subcommands, call those. First subcommand wins if there are multiple
8309 // ones.
8310 if (!parsed_subcommands_.empty()) {
8311 for (const App *sub : parsed_subcommands_)
8312 sub->_process_help_flags(trigger_help, trigger_all_help);
8313
8314 // Only the final subcommand should call for help. All help wins over help.
8315 } else if (trigger_all_help) {
8316 throw CallForAllHelp();
8317 } else if (trigger_help) {
8318 throw CallForHelp();
8319 }
8320}
8321
8322CLI11_INLINE void App::_process_requirements() {
8323 // check excludes
8324 bool excluded{false};
8325 std::string excluder;
8326 for (const auto &opt : exclude_options_) {
8327 if (opt->count() > 0) {
8328 excluded = true;
8329 excluder = opt->get_name();
8330 }
8331 }
8332 for (const auto &subc : exclude_subcommands_) {
8333 if (subc->count_all() > 0) {
8334 excluded = true;
8335 excluder = subc->get_display_name();
8336 }
8337 }
8338 if (excluded) {
8339 if (count_all() > 0) {
8340 throw ExcludesError(get_display_name(), excluder);
8341 }
8342 // if we are excluded but didn't receive anything, just return
8343 return;
8344 }
8345
8346 // check excludes
8347 bool missing_needed{false};
8348 std::string missing_need;
8349 for (const auto &opt : need_options_) {
8350 if (opt->count() == 0) {
8351 missing_needed = true;
8352 missing_need = opt->get_name();
8353 }
8354 }
8355 for (const auto &subc : need_subcommands_) {
8356 if (subc->count_all() == 0) {
8357 missing_needed = true;
8358 missing_need = subc->get_display_name();
8359 }
8360 }
8361 if (missing_needed) {
8362 if (count_all() > 0) {
8363 throw RequiresError(get_display_name(), missing_need);
8364 }
8365 // if we missing something but didn't have any options, just return
8366 return;
8367 }
8368
8369 std::size_t used_options = 0;
8370 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
8371 if (opt->count() != 0) {
8372 ++used_options;
8373 }
8374 // Required but empty
8375 if (opt->get_required() && opt->count() == 0) {
8376 throw RequiredError(opt->get_name());
8377 }
8378 // Requires
8379 for (const Option *opt_req : opt->needs_)
8380 if (opt->count() > 0 && opt_req->count() == 0)
8381 throw RequiresError(opt->get_name(), opt_req->get_name());
8382 // Excludes
8383 for (const Option *opt_ex : opt->excludes_)
8384 if (opt->count() > 0 && opt_ex->count() != 0)
8385 throw ExcludesError(opt->get_name(), opt_ex->get_name());
8386 }
8387 // check for the required number of subcommands
8388 if (require_subcommand_min_ > 0) {
8389 auto selected_subcommands = get_subcommands();
8390 if (require_subcommand_min_ > selected_subcommands.size())
8391 throw RequiredError::Subcommand(require_subcommand_min_);
8392 }
8393
8394 // Max error cannot occur, the extra subcommand will parse as an ExtrasError or a remaining
8395 // item.
8396
8397 // run this loop to check how many unnamed subcommands were actually used since they are
8398 // considered options from the perspective of an App
8399 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8400 if (sub->disabled_) continue;
8401 if (sub->name_.empty() && sub->count_all() > 0) {
8402 ++used_options;
8403 }
8404 }
8405
8406 if (require_option_min_ > used_options ||
8407 (require_option_max_ > 0 && require_option_max_ < used_options)) {
8408 auto option_list = detail::join(options_, [this](const Option_p &ptr) {
8409 if (ptr.get() == help_ptr_ || ptr.get() == help_all_ptr_) {
8410 return std::string{};
8411 }
8412 return ptr->get_name(false, true);
8413 });
8414
8415 auto subc_list = get_subcommands(
8416 [](App *app) { return ((app->get_name().empty()) && (!app->disabled_)); });
8417 if (!subc_list.empty()) {
8418 option_list += "," + detail::join(subc_list, [](const App *app) {
8419 return app->get_display_name();
8420 });
8421 }
8422 throw RequiredError::Option(require_option_min_, require_option_max_, used_options,
8423 option_list);
8424 }
8425
8426 // now process the requirements for subcommands if needed
8427 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8428 if (sub->disabled_) continue;
8429 if (sub->name_.empty() && sub->required_ == false) {
8430 if (sub->count_all() == 0) {
8431 if (require_option_min_ > 0 && require_option_min_ <= used_options) {
8432 continue;
8433 // if we have met the requirement and there is nothing in this option group skip
8434 // checking requirements
8435 }
8436 if (require_option_max_ > 0 && used_options >= require_option_min_) {
8437 continue;
8438 // if we have met the requirement and there is nothing in this option group skip
8439 // checking requirements
8440 }
8441 }
8442 }
8443 if (sub->count() > 0 || sub->name_.empty()) {
8444 sub->_process_requirements();
8445 }
8446
8447 if (sub->required_ && sub->count_all() == 0) {
8448 throw(CLI::RequiredError(sub->get_display_name()));
8449 }
8450 }
8451}
8452
8453CLI11_INLINE void App::_process() {
8454 try {
8455 // the config file might generate a FileError but that should not be processed until later
8456 // in the process to allow for help, version and other errors to generate first.
8457 _process_config_file();
8458
8459 // process env shouldn't throw but no reason to process it if config generated an error
8460 _process_env();
8461 } catch (const CLI::FileError &) {
8462 // callbacks and help_flags can generate exceptions which should take priority
8463 // over the config file error if one exists.
8464 _process_callbacks();
8465 _process_help_flags();
8466 throw;
8467 }
8468
8469 _process_callbacks();
8470 _process_help_flags();
8471
8472 _process_requirements();
8473}
8474
8475CLI11_INLINE void App::_process_extras() {
8476 if (!(allow_extras_ || prefix_command_)) {
8477 std::size_t num_left_over = remaining_size();
8478 if (num_left_over > 0) {
8479 throw ExtrasError(name_, remaining(false));
8480 }
8481 }
8482
8483 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8484 if (sub->count() > 0) sub->_process_extras();
8485 }
8486}
8487
8488CLI11_INLINE void App::_process_extras(std::vector<std::string> &args) {
8489 if (!(allow_extras_ || prefix_command_)) {
8490 std::size_t num_left_over = remaining_size();
8491 if (num_left_over > 0) {
8492 args = remaining(false);
8493 throw ExtrasError(name_, args);
8494 }
8495 }
8496
8497 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8498 if (sub->count() > 0) sub->_process_extras(args);
8499 }
8500}
8501
8502CLI11_INLINE void App::increment_parsed() {
8503 ++parsed_;
8504 for (App_p &sub : subcommands_) {
8505 if (sub->get_name().empty()) sub->increment_parsed();
8506 }
8507}
8508
8509CLI11_INLINE void App::_parse(std::vector<std::string> &args) {
8510 increment_parsed();
8511 _trigger_pre_parse(args.size());
8512 bool positional_only = false;
8513
8514 while (!args.empty()) {
8515 if (!_parse_single(args, positional_only)) {
8516 break;
8517 }
8518 }
8519
8520 if (parent_ == nullptr) {
8521 _process();
8522
8523 // Throw error if any items are left over (depending on settings)
8524 _process_extras(args);
8525
8526 // Convert missing (pairs) to extras (string only) ready for processing in another app
8527 args = remaining_for_passthrough(false);
8528 } else if (parse_complete_callback_) {
8529 _process_env();
8530 _process_callbacks();
8531 _process_help_flags();
8532 _process_requirements();
8533 run_callback(false, true);
8534 }
8535}
8536
8537CLI11_INLINE void App::_parse(std::vector<std::string> &&args) {
8538 // this can only be called by the top level in which case parent == nullptr by definition
8539 // operation is simplified
8540 increment_parsed();
8541 _trigger_pre_parse(args.size());
8542 bool positional_only = false;
8543
8544 while (!args.empty()) {
8545 _parse_single(args, positional_only);
8546 }
8547 _process();
8548
8549 // Throw error if any items are left over (depending on settings)
8550 _process_extras();
8551}
8552
8553CLI11_INLINE void App::_parse_stream(std::istream &input) {
8554 auto values = config_formatter_->from_config(input);
8555 _parse_config(values);
8556 increment_parsed();
8557 _trigger_pre_parse(values.size());
8558 _process();
8559
8560 // Throw error if any items are left over (depending on settings)
8561 _process_extras();
8562}
8563
8564CLI11_INLINE void App::_parse_config(const std::vector<ConfigItem> &args) {
8565 for (const ConfigItem &item : args) {
8566 if (!_parse_single_config(item) && allow_config_extras_ == config_extras_mode::error)
8567 throw ConfigError::Extras(item.fullname());
8568 }
8569}
8570
8571CLI11_INLINE bool App::_parse_single_config(const ConfigItem &item, std::size_t level) {
8572 if (level < item.parents.size()) {
8573 try {
8574 auto *subcom = get_subcommand(item.parents.at(level));
8575 auto result = subcom->_parse_single_config(item, level + 1);
8576
8577 return result;
8578 } catch (const OptionNotFound &) {
8579 return false;
8580 }
8581 }
8582 // check for section open
8583 if (item.name == "++") {
8584 if (configurable_) {
8585 increment_parsed();
8586 _trigger_pre_parse(2);
8587 if (parent_ != nullptr) {
8588 parent_->parsed_subcommands_.push_back(this);
8589 }
8590 }
8591 return true;
8592 }
8593 // check for section close
8594 if (item.name == "--") {
8595 if (configurable_ && parse_complete_callback_) {
8596 _process_callbacks();
8597 _process_requirements();
8598 run_callback();
8599 }
8600 return true;
8601 }
8602 Option *op = get_option_no_throw("--" + item.name);
8603 if (op == nullptr) {
8604 if (item.name.size() == 1) {
8605 op = get_option_no_throw("-" + item.name);
8606 }
8607 }
8608 if (op == nullptr) {
8609 op = get_option_no_throw(item.name);
8610 }
8611 if (op == nullptr) {
8612 // If the option was not present
8613 if (get_allow_config_extras() == config_extras_mode::capture)
8614 // Should we worry about classifying the extras properly?
8615 missing_.emplace_back(detail::Classifier::NONE, item.fullname());
8616 return false;
8617 }
8618
8619 if (!op->get_configurable()) {
8620 if (get_allow_config_extras() == config_extras_mode::ignore_all) {
8621 return false;
8622 }
8623 throw ConfigError::NotConfigurable(item.fullname());
8624 }
8625
8626 if (op->empty()) {
8627 if (op->get_expected_min() == 0) {
8628 if (item.inputs.size() <= 1) {
8629 // Flag parsing
8630 auto res = config_formatter_->to_flag(item);
8631 res = op->get_flag_value(item.name, res);
8632
8633 op->add_result(res);
8634 return true;
8635 }
8636 if (static_cast<int>(item.inputs.size()) > op->get_items_expected_max()) {
8637 if (op->get_items_expected_max() > 1) {
8638 throw ArgumentMismatch::AtMost(item.fullname(), op->get_items_expected_max(),
8639 item.inputs.size());
8640 }
8641 throw ConversionError::TooManyInputsFlag(item.fullname());
8642 }
8643 }
8644 op->add_result(item.inputs);
8645 op->run_callback();
8646 }
8647
8648 return true;
8649}
8650
8651CLI11_INLINE bool App::_parse_single(std::vector<std::string> &args, bool &positional_only) {
8652 bool retval = true;
8653 detail::Classifier classifier =
8654 positional_only ? detail::Classifier::NONE : _recognize(args.back());
8655 switch (classifier) {
8656 case detail::Classifier::POSITIONAL_MARK:
8657 args.pop_back();
8658 positional_only = true;
8659 if ((!_has_remaining_positionals()) && (parent_ != nullptr)) {
8660 retval = false;
8661 } else {
8662 _move_to_missing(classifier, "--");
8663 }
8664 break;
8665 case detail::Classifier::SUBCOMMAND_TERMINATOR:
8666 // treat this like a positional mark if in the parent app
8667 args.pop_back();
8668 retval = false;
8669 break;
8670 case detail::Classifier::SUBCOMMAND:
8671 retval = _parse_subcommand(args);
8672 break;
8673 case detail::Classifier::LONG:
8674 case detail::Classifier::SHORT:
8675 case detail::Classifier::WINDOWS_STYLE:
8676 // If already parsed a subcommand, don't accept options_
8677 _parse_arg(args, classifier);
8678 break;
8679 case detail::Classifier::NONE:
8680 // Probably a positional or something for a parent (sub)command
8681 retval = _parse_positional(args, false);
8682 if (retval && positionals_at_end_) {
8683 positional_only = true;
8684 }
8685 break;
8686 // LCOV_EXCL_START
8687 default:
8688 throw HorribleError("unrecognized classifier (you should not see this!)");
8689 // LCOV_EXCL_STOP
8690 }
8691 return retval;
8692}
8693
8694CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE std::size_t App::_count_remaining_positionals(
8695 bool required_only) const {
8696 std::size_t retval = 0;
8697 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
8698 if (opt->get_positional() && (!required_only || opt->get_required())) {
8699 if (opt->get_items_expected_min() > 0 &&
8700 static_cast<int>(opt->count()) < opt->get_items_expected_min()) {
8701 retval += static_cast<std::size_t>(opt->get_items_expected_min()) - opt->count();
8702 }
8703 }
8704 }
8705 return retval;
8706}
8707
8708CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE bool App::_has_remaining_positionals() const {
8709 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
8710 if (opt->get_positional() &&
8711 ((static_cast<int>(opt->count()) < opt->get_items_expected_min()))) {
8712 return true;
8713 }
8714 }
8715
8716 return false;
8717}
8718
8719CLI11_INLINE bool App::_parse_positional(std::vector<std::string> &args, bool haltOnSubcommand) {
8720 const std::string &positional = args.back();
8721
8722 if (positionals_at_end_) {
8723 // deal with the case of required arguments at the end which should take precedence over
8724 // other arguments
8725 auto arg_rem = args.size();
8726 auto remreq = _count_remaining_positionals(true);
8727 if (arg_rem <= remreq) {
8728 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
8729 if (opt->get_positional() && opt->required_) {
8730 if (static_cast<int>(opt->count()) < opt->get_items_expected_min()) {
8731 if (validate_positionals_) {
8732 std::string pos = positional;
8733 pos = opt->_validate(pos, 0);
8734 if (!pos.empty()) {
8735 continue;
8736 }
8737 }
8738
8739 parse_order_.push_back(opt.get());
8741 if (opt->get_inject_separator()) {
8742 if (!opt->results().empty() && !opt->results().back().empty()) {
8743 opt->add_result(std::string{});
8744 }
8745 }
8746 if (opt->get_trigger_on_parse() &&
8747 opt->current_option_state_ == Option::option_state::callback_run) {
8748 opt->clear();
8749 }
8750 opt->add_result(positional);
8751 if (opt->get_trigger_on_parse()) {
8752 opt->run_callback();
8753 }
8754 args.pop_back();
8755 return true;
8756 }
8757 }
8758 }
8759 }
8760 }
8761 for (const Option_p &opt : options_) {
8762 // Eat options, one by one, until done
8763 if (opt->get_positional() &&
8764 (static_cast<int>(opt->count()) < opt->get_items_expected_min() ||
8765 opt->get_allow_extra_args())) {
8766 if (validate_positionals_) {
8767 std::string pos = positional;
8768 pos = opt->_validate(pos, 0);
8769 if (!pos.empty()) {
8770 continue;
8771 }
8772 }
8773 if (opt->get_inject_separator()) {
8774 if (!opt->results().empty() && !opt->results().back().empty()) {
8775 opt->add_result(std::string{});
8776 }
8777 }
8778 if (opt->get_trigger_on_parse() &&
8779 opt->current_option_state_ == Option::option_state::callback_run) {
8780 opt->clear();
8781 }
8782 opt->add_result(positional);
8783 if (opt->get_trigger_on_parse()) {
8784 opt->run_callback();
8785 }
8786 parse_order_.push_back(opt.get());
8787 args.pop_back();
8788 return true;
8789 }
8790 }
8791
8792 for (auto &subc : subcommands_) {
8793 if ((subc->name_.empty()) && (!subc->disabled_)) {
8794 if (subc->_parse_positional(args, false)) {
8795 if (!subc->pre_parse_called_) {
8796 subc->_trigger_pre_parse(args.size());
8797 }
8798 return true;
8799 }
8800 }
8801 }
8802 // let the parent deal with it if possible
8803 if (parent_ != nullptr && fallthrough_)
8804 return _get_fallthrough_parent()->_parse_positional(
8805 args, static_cast<bool>(parse_complete_callback_));
8806
8808 auto *com = _find_subcommand(args.back(), true, false);
8809 if (com != nullptr &&
8810 (require_subcommand_max_ == 0 || require_subcommand_max_ > parsed_subcommands_.size())) {
8811 if (haltOnSubcommand) {
8812 return false;
8813 }
8814 args.pop_back();
8815 com->_parse(args);
8816 return true;
8817 }
8820 auto *parent_app = (parent_ != nullptr) ? _get_fallthrough_parent() : this;
8821 com = parent_app->_find_subcommand(args.back(), true, false);
8822 if (com != nullptr &&
8823 (com->parent_->require_subcommand_max_ == 0 ||
8824 com->parent_->require_subcommand_max_ > com->parent_->parsed_subcommands_.size())) {
8825 return false;
8826 }
8827
8828 if (positionals_at_end_) {
8829 throw CLI::ExtrasError(name_, args);
8830 }
8832 if (parent_ != nullptr && name_.empty()) {
8833 return false;
8834 }
8836 _move_to_missing(detail::Classifier::NONE, positional);
8837 args.pop_back();
8838 if (prefix_command_) {
8839 while (!args.empty()) {
8840 _move_to_missing(detail::Classifier::NONE, args.back());
8841 args.pop_back();
8842 }
8843 }
8844
8845 return true;
8846}
8847
8848CLI11_NODISCARD CLI11_INLINE App *App::_find_subcommand(const std::string &subc_name,
8849 bool ignore_disabled,
8850 bool ignore_used) const noexcept {
8851 for (const App_p &com : subcommands_) {
8852 if (com->disabled_ && ignore_disabled) continue;
8853 if (com->get_name().empty()) {
8854 auto *subc = com->_find_subcommand(subc_name, ignore_disabled, ignore_used);
8855 if (subc != nullptr) {
8856 return subc;
8857 }
8858 }
8859 if (com->check_name(subc_name)) {
8860 if ((!*com) || !ignore_used) return com.get();
8861 }
8862 }
8863 return nullptr;
8864}
8865
8866CLI11_INLINE bool App::_parse_subcommand(std::vector<std::string> &args) {
8867 if (_count_remaining_positionals(/* required */ true) > 0) {
8868 _parse_positional(args, false);
8869 return true;
8870 }
8871 auto *com = _find_subcommand(args.back(), true, true);
8872 if (com != nullptr) {
8873 args.pop_back();
8874 if (!com->silent_) {
8875 parsed_subcommands_.push_back(com);
